title: How We Deliver a 2‑Page Website in 24 Hours for Small Business Owners | GenForge Studio
metaTitle: 2‑Page Website in 24 Hours for Small Business Owners | GenForge Studio
metaDescription: Need a fast, professional website? GenForge Studio delivers fully responsive, SEO-ready 2‑page websites for small businesses — in just 24 hours. Includes hosting, lead forms, and WhatsApp integration.

faqs.question: How fast can you really build my website?
faqs.answer: We deliver your fully functional, mobile-optimized 2-page website within 24 hours of finalizing your content and design preferences — guaranteed.

faqs.question: What’s included in the 2-page website?
faqs.answer: You get a professional homepage and a contact/services page with lead form, WhatsApp button, mobile responsiveness, basic SEO, Google indexing, and hosting setup.

faqs.question: Can I get updates after the site is live?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We offer monthly support, one-time updates, and add-on services like landing pages, analytics, or blog setup — whenever you need them.

faqs.question: Do I need to provide content and images?
faqs.answer: We guide you through what’s needed. You can provide your own content, or we can create/edit it for you as part of our optional content assistance.

faqs.question: What if I don’t have a domain or email?
faqs.answer: We’ll help you register a domain, set up business email (like yourname@yourcompany.com), and configure DNS — all included in your onboarding call.

author: Team GenForge Studio
